data.headline: Nvidia surged on news of a multi-year AI chip infrastructure partnership with Meta, driving a broad chip and software sector recovery.
bullets: Analog Devices gained on upbeat Q2 guidance, with Cadence, Synopsys, Palantir, and Amazon also advancing.
Apple rose on reports of accelerated AI-wearables development.
Major indices posted strong gains: NASDAQ +1.27%, Russell 2000 +1.01%, S&P 500 +0.83%, Dow +0.55%.
Earnings-driven movers included Garmin (+16%), Global Payments (+11%), Wingstop, Moderna, and MSG Sports (on Knicks/Rangers split plans) outperforming.
Palo Alto Networks and Genuine Parts lagged the broader market.
Stronger-than-expected industrial production, durable goods, and housing starts supported sentiment.
Treasury yields hovered near multi-week lows while the dollar remained firm and gold traded above $4,900.
AI-sector jitters eased as Elon Muskâ€™s xAI secured $3 billion in Saudi-backed funding.
Traders await 2 p.m. ET FOMC minutes for potential rate-cut signals.
